ygData.subject: Re: [[EQ_Necromancer] Shadow Step]
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Shadow step is very usefull it has saved me countless times AFTER I learned HOW it works.  Shadow step teleports you a random distance but will ALWAYS take
ygData.messageBody:
"Shadow Panther" <shdwpanther@...> wrote:
> From: "Shadow Panther" <shdwpanther@...>
>
>
> I've a question about Shadow Step. I know it's a mini random teleport,
> but.. I have some misgivings about it.
>
> I watched another mage, while invisible, casting their Shadow Step
> outside. It was sad, they hardly went a few feet away from their original
> spot, and if they were being attacked, they could still get hit by
> whatever it was from where they went.
>
> Though I guess, in a dungeon, it would be more helpful, or is that just
> wishful thinking? Also, how long does it take to cast? Faster than Gate
> does, or the same?
>
> Thanks for the info folks.
>
> ~Myskyra / Tunare
>
>

Shadow step is very usefull it has saved me countless times AFTER I learned
HOW it works. Shadow step teleports you a random distance but will ALWAYS
take you to lower ground . If your at the top of a hill it will take you to
the bottom but never the other way around.
In a dongeon its best used while standing on a bridge or cliff it will take
you below the bridge or to the bottom of the clif. outside i like to use it by
rivers and lakes the spell usualy takes me to the bottom of the river and it
takes the monsters a while to reach me through the water
Try the spell in these areas it will make you verry happy .
Trinnes necromancer of the 5th circle
